attributes.action: Build a new, autonomous Hong Kong in the Scottish Highlands/Countryside.
attributes.additional_details: Because if they are not allowed to come here, they will all be arrested and persecuted like many others in China, like the Uighurs, the Christians, the Falun Gong, the dissidents, the LGBT and so many more. Also because Great Britain has a moral responsibility to protect its overseas passport holders, who are part of this country's history and spirit.
attributes.background: Bring every Hong Konger who wants to come to the UK here now, and allow them to build a new city in Scotland, which will enrich Scotland and also help keep it in the Union.
